snippet: The judge in the capital murder trial of James Holmes in the Aurora theater shooting dismissed a fourth juror on Monday.
abstract: Fourth juror is dismissed in capital murder trial of James Holmes, who has pleaded not guilty by reason of insanity in 2012 killing of 12 people at movie theater in Aurora, Colo.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the capital murder trial of James Holmes in the Aurora theater shooting dismissed a fourth juror on Monday.

headline.main: Colorado: Fourth Juror Dismissed in Theater Shooting
